title: Arabic 54
text: If thine heart be set upon this eternal, imperishable dominion, and this ancient, everlasting life, forsake this mortal and fleeting sovereignty.

prev.title: Arabic 53
prev.text: If poverty overtake thee, be not sad; for in time the Lord of wealth shall visit thee. Fear not abasement, for glory shall one day rest on thee.

next.title: Arabic 55
next.text: Busy not thyself with this world, for with fire We test the gold, and with gold We test Our servants.
